org.openimaj.video

Interface VideoDisplayStateListener

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    VideoDisplayAdapter, VideoPlayer

    public interface VideoDisplayStateListener
    A listener interface for objects that want to know about the state of a video display.
    Author:
    David Dupplaw (dpd@ecs.soton.ac.uk)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void videoPaused(VideoDisplay<?> v)
      Called when the video display is paused.
      void videoPlaying(VideoDisplay<?> v)
      Called when the video display is set to play.
      void videoStateChanged(VideoDisplay.Mode mode, VideoDisplay<?> v)
      Called when the video display's state changes.
      void videoStopped(VideoDisplay<?> v)
      Called when the video display is stopped.

    • Method Detail

      • videoStopped

        void videoStopped(VideoDisplay<?> v)
        Called when the video display is stopped.
        Parameters:
        v - The video display that was stopped.

      • videoPlaying

        void videoPlaying(VideoDisplay<?> v)
        Called when the video display is set to play.
        Parameters:
        v - The video display that was set to play.

      • videoPaused

        void videoPaused(VideoDisplay<?> v)
        Called when the video display is paused.
        Parameters:

      • videoStateChanged

        void videoStateChanged(VideoDisplay.Mode mode,
                     VideoDisplay<?> v)
        Called when the video display's state changes.
        Parameters:
        mode - The mode the video display changed to
        v - The video display whose state changed.
